cause.description:
Please join this noble cause in the way of a young soul with alot of dreams...even if u can donate $1 you might save 1000s of lives...or to make it simple DONATE SOME MONEY me mustang is dyin...her engine bleeds..She has war scars from God knows how many small accidents..i love her n please help me repair this car......save her.....she has been with me for 12 years...
maybe ill repair it or just runaway with the money :P but the whole point is "actions are judged by intentions"so ull get your reward frm God n ill get mine...muahahah ! yea im bored...
1. 86 must live forever !
cause.name: Funds needed for 86 :P
